alert.note: Alert for Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 27 at 5:24PM PST until December 28 at 4:08AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Siletz River at Siletz affecting Lincoln County. Trask River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trask River near Tillamook. * WHEN...From this evening to late tonight. * IMPACTS...Above 16.5 feet, expect minor flooding along the lower Trask River. Dairy farms, buildings, and a few residences adjacent to the Trask in the vicinity of Hwy 101 may be threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 15.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to flood stage late this evening. It will then fall to 10.8 feet by late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 600 AM PST.
